title: Samlucky O
author: Samlucky O
content: My people e just come to my notice say unemployment for don reduce for naija if many people were educated and informed about Bitcoin. There is a saying that Education is the key to success. But people wey no go school dey See who go school  as a waste of time and effort because of hard economy. And tag it "school na scam".School no be scam. Who no go school don  scam himself ful time. I dey always talk am say the  C.E.O of Facebook (Mack zugarberg) for don rich pass as e dey now if many people been go school. E dey always hungry many people to join bitcoin discussion or BTC investment and many other online businesses. But e no easy. If you check the rate of illiteracy for my country naija you go see say e plenty. So wetting ona go fit talk for this kind thing my people? Or wetting b the way forward.

In Nigeria now people with first class in Mechanical engineering can't even perform in there field because they where not exposed to practical aspects.Our choice of carrier in school should be in line with our learned skill, can't be a motor mechanic and going to further education in becoming a Doctor, that is a foul decision.And this will increase the rate of unemployment because of imperfections in there field.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: School no fit be scam, em still remain the gateway to success. In that gateway to success will evolve around the friends you make and the environment wey you dey so. You see as school dey so, many people d take am as where dem go read and pass exams. After 4-5 years dem go graduate and grab their certificate, dem no go like to pass through school. Passing through school in the sense of making and relenting with friends wey go one way or the other help them in the future. Some friends can ministers, CEO's of a company, governors or president sef. Na peso friend d link am up to one business or the other wey go better em life in the future. As the world d so, no be certificate d bring food. Na the kind of information wey you get through your friends or how open wey you d go determined how successful wey you go d for life. If you d do something alone, only depending on your school  certificate for success, without mingling or relenting with friends or acquiring skills, your level of success in life go d limit. By that time you go fit the follow others the call school as a scam wey be sae you no pass through school. QuoteDon’t go to school just to pass exams. Pass exams, but also pass through school. Mix with classmates. Befriend seniors. Play with juniors. Some may be presidents or Governors tomorrow. Such relationships are just as important as passing exams. Success is not just about what you know. It is also a factor of who you know. When you know good knowledge and you also know good people, only death can stop you from making good success with good money.

comments.author: Promocodeudo
comments.body: School can never be a scam, I have heard this over and over again but I already know that school is a good approach towards an individual mental growth, is just that Nigerian government has failed to create enabling environment for investors that can employ this graduates, note, not all graduates are employable because, there are some graduates that are not sound when it comes to their discipline and otherwise, another thing is, being around sound minds that has the information you need will help you too, let me use Bitcointalk forum here as a case study, I was introduced to this educative forum by someone I hold in high esteem, I got this information and started using all my energy to prove that am worthy of being here, we should not give up on our dreams because because of this statement by the people that don't understand what school stands for, opportunity might not come immediately but sooner or later it will, even though it doesn't come, make sure you go for it , just believe it, with what I know here, it is only the smart ones that add value here that survives.
